opens 5pm reservations preferred try line make sure 5 mins earlier party readythis worth checking youre area im little biased since im always japanese décor seating nifty take shoes need dont think sunday packed decided eat standing bar bit weird waits ippuku yakitori style means dishes smaller takes longer grill items noodles rice appetizers sweets group 3 ordered 2 carafe hot sake shitake mushroom onigiri mochi riceball scallion pancake ippuku ramen ahi tuna hamachi salmon squid ink fried ricetotal bill 118 wout tipsmy favorite squid ink fried rice could eat every day unique inky taste excellent rice buy squid ink comes slow thats usually yakitori think thats drink incredibly addictive delicious watch im coming back people

ippuku means cigarette break take short break japanese fitting since eating felt like cigarette overhyped dont even smoke wonder long break japanese nopicku dont think im going backafter luckily finding parking front sliver 6 pm meters turn seated back bar cooking happens lame sign said photos know rules meant broken like izakaya sort trade fuking secret smhthe wife ordered famousinfamous chicken tartare chefs choice skewers grilled hokkaido squid asahis 8the chicken tartare interesting rubbery texture something ever need try know prefer steak tartare rather brave mad cow disease salmonella day chefs choice chicken skewers inputted pos pointofsale pieceofsht system server due sort lost translation error squid came like ummmm heck sumimasen server apparently faultthe squid sauce bit sad japanese msg mayo grated daikon  i think little yuku kusho might better chicken skewers finally came server explained briskly cut chicken skewer honestly could understand engrish probably order inputted first wings gizzard obvious cuts mystery ippuku undercooks chicken purpose prepared rubbery skewer point wanted gtfomaybe bay area 4star compared izakayas overrated portions small dont wrong ippuku shouldnt commit seppuku ritual suicide anything student must awesome exotic stuff however unimpressive seriously went next door beer satiate hanger

popular going strong 1035 reviews ippuku hopping izakaya downtown offers sophisticated atmosphere complete booths partially screened foot traffic rooms everyone sits crosslegged around communal table theres variety offerings like fact things arent priced portioned excessively way try lots dishes sense capable skewers like chicken breast chicken thigh leek example quite solid savory items like baconwrapped mochi seared camembert honey sinfully satisfying heftier dishes like berkshire pork belly fill despite outwardly diminutive appearanceit may take eternity grab drink bites bar indoor heated outdoor component getting table inside service reasonably fast efficient highly recommended
